text:
I get the following error in trying to run a form in tomcat which suggests a 
problem with your taglib:

Unable to open taglibrary http://jakarta.apache.org/taglibs/input-1.0 : Parse 
Error in the tag library descriptor: Illegal character at end of document, T.

I tries version 0.90 and it had the same bug.
Can someone fix the input tag?
creator: tariq.bashir@ibase.com

text:
I believe Glenn fixed this recently; please let us know if the problem persists 
for you.
creator: bayern@essentially.net
